title: How exercise generates new neurons, improves cognition in Alzheimer's mouse

title_detail.value: How exercise generates new neurons, improves cognition in Alzheimer's mouse

summary: A study finds that neurogenesis -- inducing the production of new neurons -- in the brain structure in which memories are encoded can improve cognitive function in a mouse model of Alzheimer's disease.

summary_detail.value: A study finds that neurogenesis -- inducing the production of new neurons -- in the brain structure in which memories are encoded can improve cognitive function in a mouse model of Alzheimer's disease.
